lead_paragraph: SHANK--Lt. USN Robert E. Lt. Robert E. Shank, USN, died peacefully June 16, 2016. A graduate of Schuyler Maritime Academy (1949), he pursued a career as a marine surveyor in 1962, based from his home on St Croix, USVI. A fixture at the Comanche Club, with friends Judge O'Brien and Warner Alexander and other Crucian luminaries, he sailed the Caribbean on his yacht "Tippler". Survived by his son Todd Shank, nephew Scott Shank, his wife Judy, sons Brendan and Colin, he will be sorely missed by his devoted friend Marcia Hollins. He will be laid to rest in Sleepy Hollow, Tarrytown, New York. 1/3
